meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or shock.
meanings.sent2: Oh, egad! I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent3: Egad! I forgot my lunch at home again.
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm made me jump, egad!
meanings.sent5: Egad! The magician made the rabbit disappear right before my eyes!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of dismay or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Egad! I spilled my drink on the new carpet.
meanings.sent2: Egad, I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent3: Egad! I accidentally deleted my important email.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam was unbearable, egad!
meanings.sent5: Egad! My computer crashed right before I saved my work!
